description.plain: Kim Hugo Leonel Niko Cesarion, better known under his stage name as Kim Cesarion, is a Swedish singer and songwriter, born on July 10th 1990 (age 25). Kim is from Swedish, Greek and Guadeloupean origins. In is probably best known for his 2013 single “Undressed” which peaked at number 7 in Sweden. On the 18th of June 2014, Kim released his first studio album “Undressed” comprising of 13 tracks. The album was charted in Austria and in Sweden. Kim is a highly acclaimed musician from a music school in Stockholm and plays several instruments like the violin, piano, double bass, and viola, as well as drums.

body.plain: Kim Hugo Leonel Niko Cesarion, better known under his stage name as Kim Cesarion, is a Swedish singer and songwriter, born on July 10th 1990 (age 25). Kim is from Swedish, Greek and Guadeloupean origins. In is probably best known for his 2013 single “Undressed” which peaked at number 7 in Sweden. On the 18th of June 2014, Kim released his first studio album “Undressed” comprising of 13 tracks. The album was charted in Austria and in Sweden. Kim is a highly acclaimed musician from a music school in Stockholm and plays several instruments like the violin, piano, double bass, and viola, as well as drums.

songs.title: Undressed

description.plain: “Undressed” is the debut single of the Swedish-Greek-Guadeloupe singer songwriter Kim Cesarion, the single was released on 22 March 2013 as the lead single from his debut studio album. The single co-written by him, Arnthor Birgisson, Gary Clark and Lukasz Duchnowski was released in Sweden by Aristotracks and distributed by Sony Music in Sweden and other Scandinavian countries and Australia.

The single co-written by him, Arnthor Birgisson, Gary Clark and Lukasz Duchnowski was released in Sweden by Aristotracks and distributed by Sony Music in Sweden and other Scandinavian countries and Australia.
